content: of the 2ch space of previous round 2ch 3dc it s 1st corner 3dc 3dc ch2 3dc it s 2nd 3dc corner 3dc 3dc ch2 3dc it s 3rd corner 3dc 3dc ch2 3dc it s 4th corner 3dc slip_stitch and fasten_off if you want to change color granny corner round 4 rs ch3 counts as a double_crochet 2dc in one squares 3dc ch2 of the 2ch space of previous round 2ch 3dc 3dc it s 1st corner 3dc 3dc 3dc ch2 3dc it s 2nd corner 3dc 3dc 3dc ch2 3dc it s 3rd 3dc corner 3dc 3dc 3dc ch2 3dc it s 4th corner 3dc 3dc slip_stitch and fasten_off if you want 3dc to change color granny neck warmer pattern by ra in crochet 4 3dc corner ch2 3dc round 5 rs ch3 counts as a double_crochet 2dc in one of the 2ch space of previous round 2ch 3dc it s 1st corner 3dc 3dc 3dc 3dc 3dc ch2 3dc it s 2nd corner 3dc 3dc 3d 3dc ch2 3dc it s 3rd corner 3dc 3dc 3dc 3dc 3dc ch2 3dc it s 4th corner 3dc 3dc 3dc slip_stitch and fasten off if you want to change color 3dc granny corner 3dc round 6 rs ch3 counts as a double_crochet 2dc in one of the ch2 squares 2ch space of previous round 2ch 3dc it s 1st corner 3dc 3dc 3dc 3dc 3dc 3dc ch2 3dc it s 2nd corner 3dc 3dc 3dc 3dc 3dc ch2 3dc it s 3rd corner 3dc 3dc 3dc 3dc 3dc 3dc ch2 3dc it s 4th corner 3dc 3dc 3dc 3dc slip_stitch and fasten_off if you want to change color 3dc 3dc continue for 3 more rounds or until the 3dc side of the granny square measures 24cm repeat every steps and make another granny square granny neck warmer pattern by ra in crochet 5 now it s time to complete the front and the back panel row 1 rs attach yarn in any of the corners of the square and ch3 it counts as first stitch continue with a double_crochet in every stitch until the end of the side front and row 2 ws ch3 turn and double_crochet in every stitch back row 3 rs panel ch3 turn and double_crochet in every stitch and fasten_off do the same on the opposite side of the square granny neck warmer pattern by ra in crochet 1 to join the two panels we have to work on the ws and sew for this project i recommend to use slip stitches facing the squares on the wrong side of the work i made 8 stitches on every side but i suggest to measure the correct number of stitches to fit your head use the stitch markers to test the fitting and help in sewing sewing front and back panel ws ws don t forget to weave in your ends not like me optional make a round of single_crochet on all the edges of the neck
